entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
